Package com.sk89q.worldguard.internal.platform

Interface WorldGuardPlatform

public interface WorldGuardPlatform
A platform for implementing.

    • broadcastNotification

      void broadcastNotification(String message)
      Notifies all with the worldguard.notify permission. This will check both superperms and WEPIF, but makes sure WEPIF checks don't result in duplicate notifications
      Parameters:
      message - The notification to broadcast

    • broadcastNotification

      Notifies all with the worldguard.notify permission. This will check both superperms and WEPIF, but makes sure WEPIF checks don't result in duplicate notifications
      Parameters:
      component - The notification to broadcast

      @Nullable default ProtectedRegion getSpawnProtection(com.sk89q.worldedit.world.World world)

      Returns:
